resp = client.indices.create(
    index="my-index-000001",
    mappings={
        "dynamic_templates": [
            {
                "longs_as_strings": {
                    "match_mapping_type": "string",
                    "match": "long_*",
                    "unmatch": "*_text",
                    "mapping": {
                        "type": "long"
                    }
                }
            }
        ]
    },
)
print(resp)

resp1 = client.index(
    index="my-index-000001",
    id="1",
    document={
        "long_num": "5",
        "long_text": "foo"
    },
)
print(resp1)
